tensortrade.features.scalers.min_max_normalizer module¶

class tensortrade.features.scalers.min_max_normalizer.MinMaxNormalizer(feature_range=(0, 1), columns=None)[source]¶

Bases: tensortrade.features.transformer.Transformer

A transformer for normalizing values within a feature pipeline by the column-wise extrema.

__init__(feature_range=(0, 1), columns=None)[source]¶
Parameters

  • feature_range (optional) – A tuple containing the new (minimum, maximum) values to scale to.

  • columns (optional) – A list of column names to normalize.

fit(X, y=None)[source]¶

Fit the model to the data set, if necessary, else return self.

Parameters

  • X (Union[ndarray, DataFrame]) – The set of data to train the model on.

  • y (optional) – The target output to train on.

transform(X)[source]¶

Transform the data set with the pre-fit model.

Parameters

X (Union[ndarray, DataFrame]) – The set of data to transform.
